name: IpCGPenaltyCq
brief:
Calculated quantities for Chen-Goldfarb penalty method

CGPenaltyCq provides cached computation of quantities specific to
the Chen-Goldfarb penalty function algorithm, extending the base
IpoptCalculatedQuantities.

Key computed quantities:
- curr/trial_penalty_function(): phi_rho(x) = f(x) + rho*||c(x)||
- curr_direct_deriv_penalty_function(): Directional derivative
- curr_fast_direct_deriv_penalty_function(): For fast CG direction
- curr_cg_pert_fact(): Perturbation factor for KKT regularization
- compute_curr_cg_penalty(): Line search penalty parameter
- compute_curr_cg_penalty_scale(): KKT scaling penalty

Also computes Jacobian norms and multiplier scaling factors
needed for the penalty parameter update rules.

All quantities use CachedResults for efficiency.
